title: ICE in presence of bang type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
This test is compile-fail/never_transmute_humans.rs from miri

```rust
// This should fail even without validation
// compile-flags: -Zmir-emit-validate=0

#![feature(never_type)]
#![allow(unreachable_code)]
#![allow(unused_variables)]

struct Human;

fn main() {
    let x: ! = unsafe {
        std::mem::transmute::<Human, !>(Human) //~ ERROR entered unreachable code
    };
    f(x)
}

fn f(x: !) -> ! { x }
```

<details>
